name: qstarter
description: A collection of starter templates for quickly bootstrapping new projects
author: Blaque Allen <blaquewithaq@gmail.com>

scripts.clean: find . \( -type d \( -name dist -o -name node_modules -o -name .nuxt -o -name .output \) -exec rm -rf {} + -o -type f -name bun.lock -delete \)
